title: We're unable to log you in because you may be offline.
body:
Hey so I know a lot of people have had this problem but no matter what I do i can't seem to fix it.
So i was about to accept a game invite from a friend when my league client bugsplatted. Then after that the message in the title appeared and I couldnt log in anymore.
I tried the solution fix where people were deleting a line of code in the game packages or something, but the code would revert back everytime i opened the client again. (Yes i even tried restarting the computer before deleting the line of code and restarting before opening the client).
I tried to to a client repair, but that failed. 
I am trying to reinstall the whole game now but it won't even let me reinstall lol. Now im even further away from solving this issue

What Should I do?

Thank you

replies.body: I'm starting to notice these login issues are affecting a larger number of players. I'd like to have you try running through the steps in our [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just to triple check that everything is in order there first. If that's still not helping at all, please reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can help troubleshoot and gather more data about what's happening.
